title: Pope

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Inspire a non-Partisan player each night. They gain one use of 689: Zealot’s first ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your inspired target has the following two nights to use their ability. If they don’t, you may write a <200 character message. At the beginning of the next day, every Town member who hasn’t refused to use an ability you gave them will receive that message.
- All messages sent by you appear to be sent by “The Voice of the Sun”.
- If an inspired target uses an ability and fails to kill their target for any reason, you will learn that they used the ability and on whom.
- Players killed by abilities you give appear to have been killed by a 2443: Pope’s follower.

desc:
Post 2443
*Follow the sun, seek its light, and its light shall seek likewise you.*
